TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RoleProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class RoleProviderCollection Inherits ProviderCollection

summary.span: 继承 抽象类的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的角色提供程序公开以只读方式通过属性类。The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 你可以按名称访问集合中的特定角色提供程序并将其强制转换为特定的提供程序类型，如。You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使你可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序管理角色信息，以及访问的角色提供程序的自定义成员不属于抽象类。This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序和它们各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Roles#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/CS/Providerscs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Roles#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Roles/VB/Providersvb.aspx#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用要复制到指定的数组的角色提供程序对象。This method uses to copy role provider objects to the specified array. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法的内容复制指向数组对象。The following code example uses the method to copy the contents of a to an array of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的角色提供程序公开以只读方式通过属性类。The role providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 你可以按名称访问集合中的特定角色提供程序并将其强制转换为特定的提供程序类型，如。You can access a specific role provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使你可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序管理角色信息，以及访问的角色提供程序的自定义成员不属于抽象类。This enables you to manage role information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a role provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例访问为从应用程序配置属性按名称的类。The following code example accesses a configured for an application from the property of the class by name.
